post_message: There's a big change coming to Sports Illustrated's swimsuit edition. For the first time, the magazine will feature a plus-sized model on its pages.  Model Ashley Graham will appear in a campaign for "Swimsuits For All", heralding a new chapter in the magazine's famous swimsuit issue.  So what do you think about a plus-sized model gracing the pages of SI? A sneak peek tonight at 11 from ABC7 Eyewitness News. abc7.la/1zifFNK
